strengths: Highest commodity count in the game
Universal trade capability — can trade with anyone regardless of neighbor status
Strong objective adaptability and late-game swing potential
weaknesses: Trade strategy card often unavailable when you need it
Metagame collusion risks — table may deny you Trade
Mentak faction specifically counters your economy
tips: Prioritize Trade strategy card early game
Bank trade goods for 'spend' objectives rather than fleet building
Use planet resources for unit production; save trade goods for objectives
Build early relationships; maintain low threat perception
Tax neighbors for trade refreshes in mid-game
You have exceptional 'win from behind' capability — don't panic if behind early
